text: Benjamin James "The Toeless Wonder" Agajanian (August 28, 1919 â€“ February 8, 2018) was a former American football player. He was born in Santa Ana, California. He was a placekicker in the National Football League, and also in the All-America Football Conference and American Football League. Agajanian played for the Philadelphia Eagles, Pittsburgh Steelers, Los Angeles Dons/Rams, New York Giants, Green Bay Packers, Oakland Raiders and the San Diego Chargers. Agajanian died in Cathedral City, California on February 8, 2018 of cardiopulmonary arrest at age 98. ==References== ==Otehr websites== * Ben Agajanian, the oldest living Los Angeles Ram at 96, gets a real kick out of their return to L.A. title: Ben Agajanian
